Package online.game

Interface Summary
BoardProtocol this is the visible contract between "board" objects and the general parts of the game system.
RobotProtocol SimpleRobotProtocol plus some extra methods to interface with the search driver
SimpleRobotProtocol this is the interface to start stop and create robot players.
ViewerProtocol Technically speaking, an add-on game for boardspace only needs to implement ViewerProtocol.
ViewGameProtocol these protocl items are normally of concern only to the Game class.
 

Class Summary
BaseBoard this is the recommeded lowest level class for Boardspace boards.
ccell some legacy or simple games use just a "char" to indicate the contents of the cell.
cell this is the common cell which can be used by all boards.
chip this is the base class for "chips" which are objects typically placed on boards.
chipCell this is the principal subclass of cell for cells whose contents is just a single object.
circBoard Base class for boards with radial symmetry.
commonCanvas This class extends exCanvas and provides a bunch of services for the individual game's Viewer class.
commonFileSelector  
commonMove this class is the basis for representing individual moves in the game.
commonPlayer this class holds information about players.
dummyMove this is a class used to insert messages into the raw move history of a game.
FileSelector  
Game todo: fix "scoring rejected" caused when players reconnect after game over todo: fix "save game failed" caused by too fast games.
gBoard  
hexBoard support for generic hex boards in various convex shapes, including coordinate system transforms and drawing functions.
rectBoard  
square_geo_board common support for square geometry boards with connections in 4 or 8 directions.
squareBoard support a square board with no diagonal links.
stackCell  
triBoard support for generic triangular grid boards.
